Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®
 
 
en

Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®

 

Tropicanna Cookies x Red Poison Auto®

Photoperiod-dependent strain with red flowers and ultra-fast flowering, Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version® is a feminized genetic line resulting from the cross between a selected strain from the USA with Cookies lineage and one of the most popular autoflowering strains from the Sweet Seeds® catalog: Red Poison Auto®. The result is a highly resinous and productive cultivar that delivers exotic and beautiful flowers and exceptional potency. With sweet, fruity, and earthy flavors, it offers a very short flowering cycle, allowing for fast harvests without compromising quality or intensity.

  • 5 seeds + 2 free

Description Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®

This is the photoperiod-dependent, feminized and red-flowered version, featuring ultra-fast flowering, of one of the most recognized 'Super Strong' strains from the Cookies family in the USA: Tropicanna Cookies (Girl Scout Cookies x Tangie).

Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version® is the result of the cross between a selected elite clone of Tropicanna Cookies, from a red-flowered phenotype, and our highly regarded red-flowered autoflowering strain, Red Poison Auto® (SWS39).

The plants are very productive and resinous, with THC levels of up to 24% and extremely high terpene levels. Excellent aroma and flavor, very sweet, intense and dense, featuring notes of mango, with earthy and woody hints, and a subtle Skunk background.

What are the properties of Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version® photoperiod-dependent seeds?

Psychoactive:

Reaches THC levels of up to 24%, delivering an intense effect, both physically and mentally.

Stimulating:

Its Sativa heritage provides a cheerful, active, and creative high, ideal for social settings or artistic activities.

Relaxing:

Thanks to its Indica side, it also offers a sense of physical well-being, perfectly balancing the cerebral high with gentle body relaxation.

What are the effects of Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®?

In the mature flowers of Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®, we can find a THC content that ranges between 16% and 24%, with approximately 0.1% CBD. The synergy between these cannabinoids and the delicious terpenes produced by this strain results in a mixed and well-rounded effect: on one hand, it enhances mood and creativity with a mental boost; on the other, it relaxes the body gently, delivering a balanced and pleasurable experience.

What are the flavors of Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®?

Fruity aromas dominated by very sweet ripe mango.

Earthy and woody notes that add depth and character.

A subtle Skunk background that complements its intensity with a classic touch.

Plant Morphology

Structure:

With a 60% Indica and 40% Sativa genetic makeup, this exceptional photoperiod-dependent strain develops into robust and productive hybrid plants. They are compact, yet feature strong lateral branches that hold dense, resin-coated buds, especially striking thanks to their reddish or purple hues.

Genetic Development:

In the development of Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®, we selected Tropicanna Cookies (Girl Scout Cookies x Tangie) for its potency and beauty, and crossed it with Red Poison Auto®, our most renowned red-flowered autoflowering strain. The result is a strain that brings together the best of both worlds: potency, speed, and visual appeal.

Indoor Yield:

When grown indoors under artificial lighting, with the optimal growing parameters for this strain, Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version® can produce between 450 and 600 grams of dried buds per square meter.

Outdoor Yield:

When grown outdoors with ample sunlight, with a good quality soil mix and adequate nutrition, this strain can yield between 400 and 650 grams per plant.

Awards of Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®

Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version® was awarded 1st Prize in the Outdoor category at the 2nd Seshat Cup in Medellín (Colombia) in 2022, cementing its reputation as one of the fastest and most exotic photoperiod strains in the Sweet Seeds® catalog.

Recommended for Collectors Who:

We recommend our Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version® for collectors of ultra-fast-flowering photoperiod-dependent genetics who seek strains with an exceptional terpene profile and stunning visual appeal thanks to their reddish flowers. Ideal for those who value speed, intense aromas and flavors, and the aesthetic beauty of cannabis plants.

Data Sheet Tropicanna Poison F1 Fast Version®

SWS85

60%

6-7 weeks

approximately 80% of the specimens
Effects:
Psychoactive, Stimulating, Relaxing
Taste:
Mango, Earthy, Woody, Skunk, Sweet

Description and cookies
Functional cookies are strictly necessary to provide the services of the shop, as well as for its proper functioning, so it is not possible to refuse their use. They allow the user to browse through our website and use the different options or services that exist on it.
Cookie Provider Purpose Expiry
PHP_SESSID sweetseeds.com The PHPSESSID cookie is native to PHP and allows websites to store serialised status data. On the website it is used to establish a user session and to pass state data through a temporary cookie, which is commonly known as a session cookie. These Cookies will only remain on your computer until you close your browser. Session
PrestaShop-# sweetseeds.com This is a cookie used by Prestashop to store information and keep the user's session open. It stores information such as currency, language, customer ID, among other data necessary for the proper functioning of the shop. 120 hours
Advertising Cookies
No
Yes
Description
These are cookies that collect information about the advertisements shown to users of the website. They can be anonymous, if they only collect information about the advertising spaces shown without identifying the user, or personalised, if they collect personal information about the user of the shop by a third party, for the personalisation of these advertising spaces.
Analytics cookies
No
Yes
Description
Collect information about the user's browsing experience in the shop, usually anonymously, although sometimes they also allow the user to be uniquely and unequivocally identified in order to obtain reports on the user's interests in the products or services offered by the shop.
Performance cookies
No
Yes
Description
These are used to improve the browsing experience and optimize the operation of the shop.
Other cookies
No
Yes
Description
These are cookies without a clear purpose or those that we are still in the process of classifying.

Be the first to know our offers and news

Data controller: Sweet Seeds, S.L. The purpose of the processing is to inform subscribers of new products and services. Legal basis: unequivocal consent when contacting us and providing us with your data for this purpose, which may be the legitimate interest for management of contractual relationship. No transfer of data to third parties and kept for the duration of the relationship. You can exercise your rights at info@sweetseeds.com. Complete information on data protection: confidentiality policy

The cannabis seeds marketed by Sweet Seeds® are items intended for collectors and genetic preservation. The use of seeds and other marketed products for any purposes contrary to the current legislation is expressly prohibited. Sweet Seeds® will not sell or send cannabis seeds to countries where their possession or trade is not legal. Sweet Seeds® has established several controls to comply with this regulation. Check Legal Notice.

More info

Sweet Seeds® is committed to the legalisation of cannabis. Therefore, as part of our Crime Prevention Plan, our online shop for customers over 18 years old sets limits for the maximum number of seeds each user can purchase; namely, 25 seeds every 3 months and 100 seeds per year.


We believe this is the best way of supporting responsible home-growing and self-consumption, while also preventing our seeds from being misused for illicit purposes or gains.
